summary: Al99 a nexus user, informed me that wolfs do not howl with Dawnguard active, this fixes it.
descriptionHtml:
Fixes non Howling wolfs with the Dawnguard DLC active.

Bethesda seems to have forgotten to add a SoundPlay command to the wolf_idle_spice.hkx

Replacing it with the original fixed that, i don\'t know what bethesda did to this file but by comparing the two files i can\'t find any major changes except the missing SoundPlay command.

This mod is per request.
author: Keldis
